data.name: Butt Naked & Big Guns
data.detailed_description:
Big Guns just got fired and had all her money stolen from her account. She now has to work for a slave driver of a boss, the psychopathic Butt Naked. She must kill monsters and pests or end up on skid row.


Butt Naked & Big Guns is a side-scrolling platformer action game.
Run and Gun, kill the pests, unravel a Butt Naked story while trying to make a buck while sometimes naked.
This is a short game but we will continuously update the story.

data.short_description: Big Guns just got fired and had all her money stolen from her account. She now has to work for a slave driver of a boss, the psychopathic Butt Naked. She must kill monsters and pests or end up on skid row.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains full body nudity, detailed depictions of various sexual acts.
Several characters in this game show nudity or designed in a sexual way.
All characters are 18+
